4 Data visualisation: ggplot2 4.1 Why visualise data?

4 Data visualisation: ggplot2 library("tidyverse") 4.1 Why visualise data? 4.1.1 Anscombe’s Quartet In Anscombe, F. J. (1973). “Graphs in Statistical Analysis” there were the following dataset: quartet <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agricolamz/DS_for_DH/master/data/anscombe.csv") quartet quartet %>% group_by(dataset) %>% summarise(mean_X = mean(x), mean_Y = mean(y), sd_X = sd(x), sd_Y = sd(y), cor = cor(x, y), n_obs = n()) %>% select(-dataset) %>% round(2)
